forester
part of the DrWhy.AI developed by the MI^2 DataLab 0.1.0
  • Reference

forester

Directory description

  • R - main directory with .R files. It contains functions and documentation for datasets (with prefix data_)
  • data - contains .RData files, which are saved datasets which can be imported from the package via data(...)
  • docs - directory with items added by Przemek in intial form. It contatins files that we will use with different formats (.jpg,.html,.js,…)
  • man - contains .Rd files, which are autmatically generated manuals for functions, datasets and so on
  • pkgdown - folder with configuration of pkgdown (I think it was configuration of things liek vignettes, codecoverage, downloads and some fancy stuff)
  • tests/testthat - contains /R files which will run after executing check() or test(). As the name suggests this is the place for testing scripts
  • DESCRIPTION - Contains meta-information about the package and most importantly it manages packages imports, dependancy, suggestions
  • NAMESPACE - autmatically generated by roxygen, so don’t touch that
